15#ifndef DNS_TIMER_H
16#define DNS_TIMER_H 1
17
18/*! \file dns/timer.h */
19
20/***
21 *** Imports
22 ***/
23
24#include <stdbool.h>
25
26#include <isc/buffer.h>
27#include <isc/lang.h>
28
29ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
30
31/***
32 *** Functions
33 ***/
34
35isc_result_t
36dns_timer_setidle(isc_timer_t *timer, unsigned int maxtime,
37 unsigned int idletime, bool purge);
38/*%<
39 * Convenience function for setting up simple, one-second-granularity
40 * idle timers as used by zone transfers.
41 * \brief
42 * Set the timer 'timer' to go off after 'idletime' seconds of inactivity,
43 * or after 'maxtime' at the very latest. Events are purged iff
44 * 'purge' is true.
45 */
46
47ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
48
49#endif /* DNS_TIMER_H */
50
